sentences.sentence: To transliterate from a published work into Braille for publication.
sentences.translation: 将已经发表的作品改成盲文出版。

sentences.sentence: To transliterate into the characters of the Latin alphabet; Romanize.
sentences.translation: 把拉丁语言引入…把…拼写成拉丁字母表中的字母；使罗马化。

sentences.sentence: You composition is very good except some words were transliterate wrong!
sentences.translation: 除了一些拼写错误之外你的作文很好。
